onValueChange.description: A function that is called when the selected date changes.
onValueChange.description_zh: A function that is called when the selected date changes.

placeholder.description: The placeholder date, which is used to determine what date to start the segments from when no value exists.
placeholder.description_zh: The placeholder date, which is used to determine what date to start the segments from when no value exists.

onPlaceholderChange.description: A function that is called when the placeholder date changes.
onPlaceholderChange.description_zh: A function that is called when the placeholder date changes.

isDateUnavailable.description: A function that returns whether or not a date is unavailable.
isDateUnavailable.description_zh: A function that returns whether or not a date is unavailable.

hourCycle.description: The hour cycle to use for formatting times. Defaults to the locale preference
hourCycle.description_zh: The hour cycle to use for formatting times. Defaults to the locale preference

granularity.description: The granularity to use for formatting the field. Defaults to 'day' if a CalendarDate is provided, otherwise defaults to 'minute'. The field will render segments for each part of the date up to and including the specified granularity.
granularity.description_zh: The granularity to use for formatting the field. Defaults to 'day' if a CalendarDate is provided, otherwise defaults to 'minute'. The field will render segments for each part of the date up to and including the specified granularity.

hideTimeZone.description: Whether or not to hide the time zone segment of the field.
hideTimeZone.description_zh: Whether or not to hide the time zone segment of the field.

validationId.description: The id of your validation message element, if any, which will be applied to the aria-describedby attribute of the appropriate elements when a validation error occurs.
validationId.description_zh: The id of your validation message element, if any, which will be applied to the aria-describedby attribute of the appropriate elements when a validation error occurs.

descriptionId.description: The id of your description element, if any, which will be applied to the aria-describedby attribute of the appropriate elements.
descriptionId.description_zh: The id of your description element, if any, which will be applied to the aria-describedby attribute of the appropriate elements.

maxValue.description: The maximum valid date that can be entered.
maxValue.description_zh: The maximum valid date that can be entered.

minValue.description: The minimum valid date that can be entered.
minValue.description_zh: The minimum valid date that can be entered.

locale.description: The locale to use for formatting dates.
locale.description_zh: The locale to use for formatting dates.

disabled.description: Whether or not the accordion is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: Whether or not the accordion is disabled.

readonly.description: Whether or not the field is readonly.
readonly.description_zh: Whether or not the field is readonly.

readonlySegments.description: An array of segments that should be readonly, which prevent user input on them.
readonlySegments.description_zh: An array of segments that should be readonly, which prevent user input on them.

slots.name: ids
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).

slots.name: isInvalid
slots.description: Whether or not the field is invalid.
slots.description_zh: Whether or not the field is invalid.
